name: SMASH 4077
description:
Known Bugs: The tongues are really tricky to use. We never quite figured out how to get the drag and drop smooth. If anyone has any tips on that it would greatly be appreciated.

Seeking Feedback: Thanks for the taking the time to play the game! This is my friend and I's second game ever and we are considering expanding on the project. If anyone has any advice on:

1)How we can make the surgery more exciting

2)Do people find the lounge area enjoyable? Should we expand on the interpersonal stories or focus more on the game play in the surgery room?

3)Any general thoughts on the game?

Tips while playing:

1. Change tools with WASD

2.Put the right amount of organs into the alien by consulting the book

3. Remeber to close the patient when you are done

4.Keep Bacteria below 7 otherwise the patient will die
